data.name: PageTitle
data.comment: Main vault page title

data.name: PageDescription
data.value: Encuentre todos sus elementos a continuación.
data.comment: Page description text

data.name: ViewModeLabel
data.comment: Label for view mode dropdown

data.name: GridViewOption
data.comment: Grid view option in dropdown

data.name: TableViewOption
data.comment: Table view option in dropdown

data.name: SortOrderLabel
data.comment: Label for sort order dropdown

data.name: OldestFirstOption
data.comment: Oldest first sort option

data.name: NewestFirstOption
data.comment: Newest first sort option

data.name: AlphabeticalOption
data.comment: Alphabetical sort option

data.name: NoItemsTitle
data.comment: Title when no items exist

data.name: CreateFirstItemText
data.value: Crea tu primer elemento usando el
data.comment: Text explaining how to create first item

data.name: NewAliasButtonText
data.comment: Text reference to the New Alias button (desktop)

data.name: NewAliasButtonTextMobile
data.comment: Text reference to the New Alias button (mobile)

data.name: ButtonLocationText
data.value: botón en la esquina superior derecha.
data.comment: Text describing button location

data.name: OrText
data.comment: Separator text between options

data.name: ImportItemsText
data.value: Si previamente utilizó un gestor de contraseñas diferente, puede importar sus elementos de él.
data.comment: Text explaining import option

data.name: ImportButtonText
data.value: Importar desde KeePass, Bitwarden, Chrome, Firefox...
data.comment: Import button text

data.name: FailedToLoadItemsMessage
data.comment: Error message when items fail to load

data.name: FilterLabel
data.comment: Label for filter dropdown

data.name: FilterAllOption
data.comment: Filter option to show all items

data.name: FilterPasskeysOption
data.comment: Filter option to show only passkeys

data.name: FilterAliasesOption
data.comment: Filter option to show only aliases

data.name: FilterUserpassOption
data.comment: Filter option to show only username/passwords

data.name: FilterAttachmentsOption
data.comment: Filter option to show only items with attachments

data.name: FilterRecentlyDeletedOption
data.comment: Filter option to show recently deleted items

data.name: NoPasskeysFound
data.value: Aún no se han creado claves de acceso. Las llaves se añaden a través de la extensión del navegador o de las aplicaciones móviles cuando visitan un sitio web que soporta contraseñas y ofrece autenticación de contraseñas.
data.comment: Empty state message when no passkeys are found

data.name: NoAttachmentsFound
data.comment: Empty state message when no items with attachments are found

data.name: NoItemsFound
data.value: No hay elementos que coincidan con el filtro.
data.comment: Empty state message when no items match the filter

data.name: EmptyFolderMessage
data.comment: Empty state message when folder has no items

data.name: AllItemsInFoldersMessage
data.value: Todos sus elementos están organizados en carpetas. Haga clic en una carpeta para ver sus credenciales o utilice la búsqueda para encontrar elementos específicos.
data.comment: Empty state message when all items are in folders and none at root level

data.name: NewFolder
data.comment: Button text for creating a new folder

data.name: EditFolder
data.comment: Button text for editing a folder

data.name: DeleteFolder
data.comment: Button text for deleting a folder

data.name: BackToRoot
data.comment: Button text for navigating back to root

data.name: FailedToCreateFolder
data.comment: Error message when folder creation fails

data.name: FailedToDeleteFolder
data.comment: Error message when folder deletion fails

data.name: LoadingMore
data.comment: Text shown when loading more items during infinite scroll

data.name: ClearFilter
data.comment: Button text for clearing the active filter

data.name: FilteringBy
data.comment: Label shown when a filter is active
